== Aldona (CT) (626704) ==

Aldona (CT) is a town in the [[BARDEZ 002]] taluka of [[NORTH GOA]] district with an area of 8.04 sq. km. and harbouring 1624 households with total population of 6270 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[PANAJI]] is at a distance of 18 km. The state headquarter [[PANAJI]] is at a distance of 18 km. Male population is 2925 and female population is 3345. Scheduled Caste population is 209 and Scheduled Tribes population is 200. Census Location Code of the town is 626704<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class V (population_total 5,000 to 9,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is BELGAUM at a distance of 180 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is PUNE at a distance of 475 km. Railway station is at TIVIM at a distance of 19 km.

== Sanitation and Drinking Water ==  
The town has open and closed drainage system.
Water is supplied from a service reservoir. The town gets it water as tap water from a treated source. The capacity of the water supply system is 1100 kilo-litres.

The nearest fire fighting service is at MAPUSA (9 km) .
